pr_title: Extracting interface from `ScrollResult` to encapsulate ES-specifics.

timeline.bodyText: Annotations on the same line? Blasphemy!
timeline.author: alex-konn

timeline.bodyText: I know this bug was in here before, but there's a placeholder missing in the format string. I think we should fix that.
timeline.author: alex-konn

timeline.message: Trying to remedy the frivolous and profane omission of sacred line breaks.
